channel.title: Categories on Martina Martonskj
channel.description: Recent content in Categories on Martina Martonskj

item.description: Tampep Onlus is an Organization based in Torino. It works to support the rights of vulnerable and socially discriminated people, promoting actions and interventions in consideration of their choices and dignity. On the occasion of their 20th anniversary, Tampep Onlus asked me to draw the illustrations for their postcards and bags.

item.title: Loving My Body. Series for Crevaduris
item.description: Creavduris is a project aimed at raising awareness on the issues of pain and rebirth. The serie “loving my body”, addresses the issue of insecurities and fragility related to one’s own body, fostered by a society that regularly tells us how we are supposed to be. At the same time, the series reflects on the possibility of rebirth as a proud acceptance of one’s own body.

item.title: Rape culture
item.description: Series of illustrations for the article “la cultura dello stupro in Italia: i dati alla mano”, written by Anna Stanchi and edited by EqualiLab Italia, April 2021.

item.title: SessFem
item.description: SessFem is a self-organised workshop, free and open to everyone, an experience of exploration, collective learning, a place to reappropriate and redefine the personal body, pleasure, language and education. This series of drawings has been created for the edition of SessFem Torino 2021.

item.title: Sisterhood
item.description: “Sisterhood” has been selected as one of the three winners of the contest “Collaging a Gender-Equal Future: Tailoring the Transformations of the Euro-Mediterranean Space”, launched together with the European Institute of the Mediterranean as part of the Voix de femmes project, led by Forum Femmes Mediterranee.

item.title: The power of the anger
item.description: Illustrations about the power (and legitimacy) of anger.
